remember_last_used_settings.description: The dialog should store the user's most recent selections to streamline repeated report generation tasks.

details.why: Civil 3D users frequently generate the same report package multiple times during design iterations. Remembering preferences reduces repetitive setup.
details.how_it_works: Write preferences to a small config file (JSON/XML) in the user's AppData or the plugin's installation folder.

preset_manager.description: Enables users to save named configurations for quick reuse.

details.why: Engineers often need different output bundles depending on whether the recipient is internal, external, or part of a specific submittal.
details.how_it_works: Saved presets stored in a JSON array. Selecting a preset instantly loads all settings.

auto_validate_output_path.description: Checks whether the selected output directory exists and is writable.

details.why: Prevents errors from invalid paths or OneDrive sync delays.
validation_rules: Warns if the path is synced (OneDrive/Dropbox) and may cause delays
details.ui_behavior: Disable the OK button until the path is valid.

bulk_selection_shortcuts.description: Allows users to quickly toggle multiple checkbox groups.

details.why: Reduces excessive clicking when multiple formats are needed.
Large alignments or long Excel outputs can take time; users want reassurance.
features: Success or failure summary at the end

tooltips.description: Provides context-sensitive help for output formats.

details.why: New users and interns may not know the purpose of each output type.

examples.PDF: A printable engineering report formatted for submittal.
examples.TXT: A plain text version used for quick checks or basic review.
examples.XML: Machine-readable data for importing to other tools like Bentley or GIS.
examples.Excel: Spreadsheet output used for tabulation, calculations, and cost estimation workflows.

details.presentation: Tooltip appears on hover with small delay (300–500 ms).

preview_output_names.description: Shows the exact filenames that will be generated.

details.why: Avoids confusion when multiple alignments share similar names.
details.behavior: Updates dynamically when report type or output path changes.
details.location: Displayed beneath the Base Output Path field in a read-only box.

open_after_creation.description: Automatically opens output files or folders once the report is generated.

details.why: Saves time digging through file explorer paths.
details.behavior: Opens only if processing completes successfully.

group_boxes.description: Organize the dialog into clearly separated sections.

details.benefit: Improves scanning and reduces cognitive load.

consistent_alignment.description: Uniform sizing and spacing of controls.

requirements: Aligned checkboxes in a clean vertical grid
details.benefit: Creates a clean, professional, CAD-like aesthetic.

icons.description: Add small, subtle icons next to report options.

details.benefit: Faster visual recognition, especially for veteran CAD users.

dropdown_size.description: Increase width of the Report Type dropdown.

details.reason: Longer report names (e.g., 'Superelevation Transition Report') should be visible.
details.improvement: Avoids truncated names and enhances clarity.

divider_lines.description: Soft gray separators between major sections.

details.why: Adds structure without overwhelming the interface.

improved_button_area.description: Refine placement and grouping of action buttons.

details.layout: Center the OK and Cancel buttons horizontally.
details.why: A cleaner end-of-dialog workflow and easier mouse targeting.

live_preview_panel.description: Shows a real-time preview of the content that will appear in the report.

details.why: Helps catch incorrect selections before report generation.

theme_awareness.description: The dialog respects AutoCAD's dark/light themes.

behavior: Switch icons and divider colors accordingly
details.benefit: Feels more native to Civil 3D’s environment.

output_template_designer.description: A customization tool allowing deeper control of output formatting.

details.storage: Templates saved as XML or JSON configurations
details.benefit: Supports firm-wide standards and professional submittal requirements.
